Bolstered Glacytes are empowered glacytes summoned during the Arch-Glacor fight in hard mode. These appear when the Arch-Glacor has been damaged and summons minions in encounters of 250%+ enrage and higher.

Life points[edit | edit source]

The life points of the bolstered glacyte remain constant up until 2,500% enrage. Above 2,500% enrage, it has increased life points. The relation of its life points, LP, as a function of enrage, E can be expressed in the following way:

LPBolstered Glacyte={N/Aif E<25027,000if 250≤E≤2,50027,000+270⋅⌊(E−2,500)/2.50⌋if E>2,500

Templates used
Arch-Glacor LP

template = Arch-Glacor LP form = batcalcin result = batcalcout param = enrage|Enrage (%)|0|int|0-4000||
